body:
Hello,
I am going to be taking over the community removals seeing as Robin who was doing these stepped down. 

In our recent Map development meeting have we been discussing a lot of things. And one the things we'd like to introduce is something we call "The community removal". We're doing this to get the community's feedback on maps, if they would like to keep the maps or not.
This thread will be rebooted every week with 4 new maps!

--------

Last week's results are following:
Dust Devils: Relocate the monument locations
Honeybomb: Remove
Halcyon: Add some more iron
Teres: Remove

--------

So, how does this little thing work?

Every week on this thread you will see 4 maps. These maps are being discussed if we should keep or not. Under me you will right now see four different maps. We, Map Developers would like you to share your thought of this map. Do you want this map to stay, or get removed? When you give your opinion on the map, please do motivate why you think like you do. Maybe we wont have to remove the map and instead make a certain change to it instead! And remember to always put the tag "keep, edit or remove", otherwise we Map developers may not understand your point and we get confused if you want to keep it or not.

The following 4 maps that will either be removed/stay:

Unix:


Rendezvous Redux:


Dragon Valley:


Infernus:

--------

This is when you can make a change, please motivate why you think like you do. Hopefully this will improve and create a better avicus experience.

Regards

The Map Devs
body_tagged:
Hello,
I am going to be taking over the community removals seeing as Robin who was doing these stepped down. 

In our recent Map development meeting have we been discussing a lot of things. And one the things we'd like to introduce is something we call "The community removal". We're doing this to get the community's feedback on maps, if they would like to keep the maps or not.
This thread will be rebooted every week with 4 new maps!

--------

Last week's results are following:
Dust Devils: Relocate the monument locations
Honeybomb: Remove
Halcyon: Add some more iron
Teres: Remove

--------

So, how does this little thing work?

Every week on this thread you will see 4 maps. These maps are being discussed if we should keep or not. Under me you will right now see four different maps. We, Map Developers would like you to share your thought of this map. Do you want this map to stay, or get removed? When you give your opinion on the map, please do motivate why you think like you do. Maybe we wont have to remove the map and instead make a certain change to it instead! And remember to always put the tag "keep, edit or remove", otherwise we Map developers may not understand your point and we get confused if you want to keep it or not.

The following 4 maps that will either be removed/stay:

Unix:


Rendezvous Redux:


Dragon Valley:


Infernus:

--------

This is when you can make a change, please motivate why you think like you do. Hopefully this will improve and create a better avicus experience.

Regards

The Map Devs
title: The community removal | #3

replies.body: Nice
replies.body_tagged: Nice

replies.body:
Unix- Keep, good gameplay but maybe move the monuments back a little.

rendezvous redux- Keep, a good map like the original with nice aesthetics.

Dragon Valley- Remove, can be too confusing and gameplay is bad.

Infernus- Keep, good gameplay and fun to play.

Youre welcome Tazz (:

replies.body: Keep all but Infernus
replies.body_tagged: Keep all but Infernus

replies.body:
Unix: [KEEP] Make changes to the monument placements, too far away IMO. Also make the enchantment table more visible? (Hiding them underground is pointless) possibly move them near the front if spawn?

Rendezvous Redux: [KEEP] The gameplay is decent on this map I would recommend lowering the diamond supply and adding more iron.

Dragon Valley- [REMOVE] The map has so many problems and is very confusing.

Infernus- [KEEP] I'm not a huge fan of the map but its plays pretty well. No complaints.
replies.body_tagged:

Dragon Valley- [REMOVE] The map has so many problems and is very confusing.

Infernus- [KEEP] I'm not a huge fan of the map but its plays pretty well. No complaints.

infernus make the 2 islands wider and add a premade bridge from spawn instead of that rickety bridge

RENDEZVOUOS REDUX: This map is getting a little bit old, although it is good I think it needs a revamp to get that new feeling.

DRAGON VALLEY: I don't really play on this map but I don't really like it. Too confusing

INFERNUS: Is a good map although most of the time the game is really long, quick or the whole team just kill farms one team.
